verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. I will lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> mine eyes <WH5869> unto the hills <WH2022>, from whence <WH370> cometh <WH935> <WH8799> my help <WH5828>.
My help <WH5828> cometh from the YY <WH3068>, which made <WH6213> <WH8802> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>.
He will not suffer <WH5414> <WH8799> thy foot <WH7272> to be moved <WH4132>: he that keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> thee will not slumber <WH5123> <WH8799>.
Behold, he that keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall neither slumber <WH5123> <WH8799> nor sleep <WH3462> <WH8799>.
The YY <WH3068> is thy keeper <WH8104> <WH8802>: the YY <WH3068> is thy shade <WH6738> upon thy right <WH3225> hand <WH3027>.
The sun <WH8121> shall not smite <WH5221> <WH8686> thee by day <WH3119>, nor the moon <WH3394> by night <WH3915>.
The YY <WH3068> shall preserve <WH8104> <WH8799> thee from all evil <WH7451>: he shall preserve <WH8104> <WH8799> thy soul <WH5315>.
The YY <WH3068> shall preserve <WH8104> <WH8799> thy going out <WH3318> <WH8800> and thy coming in <WH935> <WH8800> from this time forth, and even for <WH5704> evermore <WH5769>.
